body: You have long served at a temple in a city, and not only did you pick up on many of the nobility's customs, you spent much time in the temple libraries studying your faith. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Knowledge (nobility) and Knowledge (religion) checks, and one of these skills (your choice) is always a class skill for you.
name: Child of the Temple
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Basic Traits/Faith Traits/Child of the Temple
